# Problem 1

```{r}
aux = 0
for(i in 1:999) {
  if(i %% 3 == 0 || i %% 5 == 0) {
    aux = aux + i
  }
}
```

# Problem 2

```{r}
seq <- c(1,2)
i = 3
repeat {
  seq[i] <- seq[i-1] + seq[i - 2]
  if(seq[i] >= 4000000){
    break
  }
  i = i + 1
}
sum(seq[seq < 4000000 & seq %% 2 == 0])
```
